name: Curse of the Midnight Sun
text: If you control a face-up "Gaia, the Polar Knight" or "Curse of the Morning Moon": You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Gaia" or "Curse of" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate each effect of "Curse of the Mignight Sun" once per turn.
